actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide that a finding of permanent and total disability under title II or XVI of the Social Security Act, chapter 13 or 15 of title 38, United States Code, or the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 will be considered as a finding of disability under any of such programs, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that a finding of permanent and total disability under title II (OASDI) or XVI (Grants to States for AID to the AGED, BLIND and DISABLED) of the Social Security Act, chapter 13 or 15 of title 38, United States Code (Veterans' Benefits), or the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 will be considered as a finding of disability under any of such programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide that a finding of permanent and total disability under title II or XVI of the Social Security Act, chapter 13 or 15 of title 38, United States Code, or the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 will be considered as a finding of disability under any of such programs, and for other purposes.
